post.author: 이성기
post.content:
Data Control Operator 3 year contract Project Description
Data Control Operations is the single point of contact between Production Control and the User community. Data Control operators are accountable for scheduling and monitoring production schedule on the mainframe and client server platforms according to pre-set job flows to eliminate processing conflict and ensures highest work performance and reliability. Data Control Operators use Key101 software to key batched data.
Duties of work
Data Control Operations is the single point of contact between Production Control and the User community. Data Control operators are accountable for scheduling and monitoring production schedule on the mainframe and client server platforms according to pre-set job flows to eliminate processing conflict and ensures highest work performance and reliability. Data Control Operators use Key101 software to key batched data. The position - Data Control Operator is responsible for:
• Batch, key and verify input data using various Key/Master Data Entry applications on the mainframe and/or on the client/server platforms • Submit jobs to the mainframe using the automatic scheduling software - PCS • Log and verify control totals for various applications • Distribute and mail high volume of reports to various users locations • Send and receive data files electronically using various data transmission methods (i.e. FTP, SFTP ... etc.)
Skills required Data Control Operations is the single point of contact between Production Control and the User community. Data Control operators are accountable for scheduling and monitoring production schedule on the mainframe and client server platforms according to pre-set job flows to eliminate processing conflict and ensures highest work performance and reliability. Data Control Operators use Key101 software to key batched data.
If interested please submit your latest Resume to
Raman Aneja raman@noramtec.com
post.title: Data Control Operator 3 year contract
